sentences.en: a law firm with an unblemished reputation
sentences.cn: 声誉良好的律师事务所

sentences.en: And white, true white, pristine and unblemished.
sentences.cn: 还有白色, 真正的白色, 质朴无华,完美无瑕.

sentences.en: Be sure to select firm, unblemished fruit.
sentences.cn: 一定要选坚实、无疤痕的果子。

sentences.en: Ghana does not have an unblemished record on human rights.
sentences.cn: 加纳在人权方面并非毫无瑕疵。

sentences.en: He has an unblemished employment record.
sentences.cn: 他的(工作)履历毫无污点.

sentences.en: I've been hearing about your unblemished reputation for a long time, and greatly respect you.
sentences.cn: 我久闻先生的清誉, 十分敬仰.

sentences.en: Just as honor is a prerequisite for respectability, so is unblemished character a barometer of integrity.
sentences.cn: 正如声誉是可敬的前提条件, 无暇疵的品格是正直的晴雨表.

sentences.en: So far Mr Kleinfeld's integrity is unblemished.
sentences.cn: 到今天为止,柯菲德的职业操守一清二白.

sentences.en: This pure boy arrived fresh and unblemished.
sentences.cn: 这个纯真的男孩闯了进来,纯净无暇.

sentences.en: When Stewart passed through, the pavement was new and unblemished, with sharply defined, regular edges.
sentences.cn: 斯图尔特曾途经此地, 那时的路面崭新无损,界限明晰, 边缘整齐,符合规格.

sentences.en: You essence is as pure and perfect as an unblemished jewel.
sentences.cn: 你的本质如同无瑕的珠宝一样完美无缺.

trans.tran_cn: （人的名声、记录或性格）无污点的，完美无缺的，无瑕疵的
trans.tran_en: not spoiled by any mistake or bad behaviour
